body_html: @gunan Ah, did not realize you cherrypicked. I assumed, the semantic version releases were also cut from master whenever one was ready to ship. So while the nightly build might not be spot on, I thought them to be sufficiently close to the release build. Should have been digging deeper I suppose...😄

So while the nightly build might not be spot on, I thought them to be sufficiently close to the release build. Should have been digging deeper I suppose...😄
body: @gunan Ah, did not realize you cherrypicked. I assumed, the semantic version releases were also cut from `master` whenever one was ready to ship. So while the nightly build might not be spot on, I thought them to be sufficiently close to the release build. Should have been digging deeper I suppose...:smile:
